document.title: Health Education Standards of Learning for Virginia Public Schools

EB6B8DC8D6B5467FA257052D9E5CD265.description:
Create strategies to keep the environment healthy, including proper disposal of trash,
recycling or reusing, and water conservation.

6705439A9ABE49BEBE3722956EAB85E5.description: Demonstrate best ways to solve social problems.

DA376971D67640458FB0E3B30985B801.description: Demonstrate responsible behaviors when interacting with others.

EA76E91BA3D846D3A9F1F3B9A84F3BC7.description:
Apply strategies for establishing and respecting others' personal space, boundaries, and
belongings.

91FA524DA3C94883BBF3F3FA8A4A93AF.description: Demonstrate cooperation with friends and classmates.

CC8F8645C6AB4570A432D0CF15605549.description: Demonstrate ways to express feelings appropriately.

415A95BC9BB74511840452B5B5D64ED1.description: Describe the proper way to apply sunscreen.

590C823632FA457AAB9D5B5429561A77.description: Practice fire safety and emergency/disaster procedures.

97FCC4548F444648955DEFFA22CCD06B.description:
Promote positive behaviors for personal safety, including bus and automobile safety,
pedestrian safety, playground safety, fire safety, water safety, Internet safety, and safety
when biking and using other recreational equipment.

CCC252AF992E4A3195F418AA64F91E64.description: Create safety rules for medications in the home.

521C79176EC2407BA78B29B211B30F72.description: Describe how one selected health professional/adult helps keep children healthy.

7BF46FECB8234D369FABA47AEAAF36FB.description: Promote behaviors that impact health and wellness.

64FD821D186949A2A70CE1B927A1BBC9.description: Encourage classmates to be physically active inside and outside of school.

7B513F6910DD42D0B4BA63D09E8D3626.description:
Describe how one can get help from an adult if a classmate is having an allergic
reaction.

543D0FE789214CE183ECEBA8A2CC737D.description:
Explain that all foods can fit into a healthful diet through balance, variety, and
moderation.

D783A16835574EE3A2EC7CC7F015BC9D.description: Share ways to maintain a healthy heart, brain, and lungs for lifelong health.

8486401ED05A4ADAB990D0696F1D5BDE.description:
The student will identify specific rules and practices to promote personal safety and
socially responsible behaviors.

76B12658FD9A400FBDFFE04D206F95AE.description:
Explain why it is important to dispose of trash properly, recycle materials, conserve
water, and prevent water pollution.

2B68F3174A8F4A37B13A5669109E24A0.description: Explain how to listen and use words to respond to and solve problems.

0CCC3EFC36264AD286777AC100EE9000.description: Explain the importance of responsible behaviors when interacting with others.

574A9C5631A54AC69731CF16290D3706.description: Identify strategies for respecting others’ personal space, boundaries, and belongings.

4464C98B356747D9AFE01B3722EFCACC.description: Explain how listening is important for effective communication.

FB778F91B0B24E2297EADB0AFFEFA8D5.description: Explain the importance of showing kindness, consideration, and concern for others.

E1265572A73E47998BAFC4FECE062E75.description:
Identify appropriate ways a person may express feelings (e.g., happy, unhappy, mad)
and trusted adults to share feelings with at school and at home.

F41280C70D6E46879A1B44AD71367486.description: Identify the importance of sun safety.

DDD2D72D1B3F44799FA7850CF9F93C14.description: Describe how to report a dangerous situation.

46AF2A50329E422F9C7C6B794E4F6BF6.description: Explain why it is important to follow safety rules and guidelines for personal safety.

831F1E182A144B37BD2CE41632C7CC53.description: Explain the harmful effects of misusing medicines and drugs.

E4DC90689B9A463FA87F667C46354703.description: Explain the need for regular health checkups and screenings (e.g., medical, dental).

3BB9675A146F48EBA2B6EBA7D08C432D.description: Determine how sleep habits affect mood and academic performance.

7B465919F8254E8F8995A2E6BBB41216.description: Identify ways to increase physical activity.

976734C0C4E74DFB8E3055DBB20B641C.description:
Explain how allergens remain on surfaces and why it is important to clean surfaces and
hands before and after eating.

1B691444F0C34EB991D32A3E5A34BFFA.description:
Identify "sometimes foods" (e.g., candy, cookies, chips, ice cream, soda) and recognize
that not all food products advertised or sold are healthy.

01DC6099F02F40358AD2359471F99E8B.description: Describe the importance of having a healthy heart, brain, and lungs.

7527F77C88084539A6EC73E28309E033.description: The student will explain that good health is related to healthy decisions.

0F1B595C7DD04ADAB21257ACDFAFC9A2.description: Identify items and materials that can be reduced, recycled, repurposed, or reused.

8F8FD079854D403D8016BC83F6BB3C57.description: Describe personal space and boundaries for oneself and others.

E111CE1DB84846A1BB9FF91C55F4B28D.description:
Describe feelings that may result from hearing kind and unkind words and when
experiencing problems (e.g., someone not sharing).

5B868B1C68B2494D95B341BDAA862B38.description:
Identify cooperative and responsible behaviors, such as respect for others, adherence to
school rules, acceptance of responsibility, and respect for the property of others.

06740B10C355458DBC2F0A61830EBA57.description: Describe positive characteristics that are unique to each individual.

A89DFC6243B84F6A90933103CEA7ECF6.description:
Identify comfortable and uncomfortable feelings and when one might experience these
feelings.

B55A248EB029434DB5D5DBA33E72270F.description:
Compare and contrast personal safety behaviors at home, at school, and in the
community.

12DDA9B1953041ABBD23370272C9EF82.description:
Identify safety rules and guidelines for bus and automobile safety, pedestrian safety,
playground safety, fire safety, water safety, Internet safety, and safety when biking and
using other recreational equipment.

3024F704C80B44C1AE6FA0D7432426B1.description: Identify that medicines can be both helpful and harmful.

3FA824CF6E8C43A2BB0A927B8FAA7EF5.description:
Identify adults who keep children healthy (e.g., parents/guardians, teachers, school
counselors, nurses, dentists, doctors).

D2DEB8D60CBA48569AEB1A8CFC5C0269.description:
Identify behaviors that promote health and wellness, including personal hygiene, sleep,
physical activity, and healthy food choices.

BAF0248CDB7D497C9AAF86BBB59894E5.description: Recognize that physical activity is a form of healthy entertainment.

2CEBCF7E6CFC454BA311FD8A8377D5F8.description: Explain what physical reactions may occur if someone is having an allergic reaction.

DAB0F6DC43C24818872126AE11EE5BA2.description:
Identify why it is important to consume a variety of foods and beverages from the five
MyPlate food groups (i.e., fruits, vegetables, grains, protein, dairy).

63E223ED58564AA49E31F52AADB6D9D4.description:
Identify major body organs (e.g., heart, brain, lungs, stomach) and location of the
organs.

C8262D46020A48698F1460709592426B.description:
The student will identify the basic components and functions of human body systems and
the importance of safe practices, positive interpersonal relationships, and environmental
health.
